Description: Rim sherd (mended from two fragments) of Chian Simple Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below; part of lotus flower in added white outline with added red centres; top of rim glazed; exterior: dot band between dilute lines; inscription on exterior.
Bibliographic references: Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (pl. 21.1.4)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0989) (phase 2)
